with (x) {
	console.log("x.test", test);
	console.log("x.result", result);
}
/**************************************************/
with(x){console.log("x.test",test);console.log("x.result",result);}
/**************************************************/
with ( x )
{
	console.log( "x.test", test );
	console.log( "x.result", result );
}
